Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerListener
    This class is the Server, the core of the application
    Author:
    Carlo Dell'Acqua

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts collecting players from the waiting room and fills up the available rooms
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors regarding the socket infrastructure occur
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is forced to stop

        private void createRoom()
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a virtual room using the GameInitializer class and start the execution of the controller
